item.title: The Precipice
item.description: The music is freaky‚Ä¶ Observations Lots of holes that look out off of cliff Clipboard under hard hat on crate: Whaaaat am I looking at‚Ä¶ WHAAAAT Ohhhh interesting‚Ä¶ so I know that rooms that I‚Äôve been in have chess pieces‚Ä¶ do i need to explore during the day, take note of what room is where, and then ...

item.title: Gemstone Cavern
item.description: Unlocked by solving the puzzle in the Utility Room Observations: Note Gas line :V in my personal first run, this was the 4th one i needed and it made a thing rise! .

item.title: Exhibit Security System
item.description: in: Closed Exhibit Stumbled upon exhibit security system in the hallway: OH DANG Reset only gives you 10 seconds to get to the crown before the tripwire comes back online OOF need to be smart about this to get that crown.
